name: SurfQual
author: SSCC/NIMH/NIH
description: A program to check the quality of surfaces.

inputs.description: Indicates that surfaces read are spherical.
inputs.name: Sphere Flag

inputs.description: Provide summary of results to stdout.
inputs.name: Summary Flag

inputs.description: Check if surface is self intersecting.
inputs.name: Self Intersect Flag

inputs.description: Prefix of output files. Default is the surface's label.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

output-files.description: File containing distances of nodes from the surface's center.
output-files.name: Distance Output File

output-files.description: Colorized file containing distances of nodes from the surface's center.
output-files.name: Distance Color Output File

output-files.description: File containing nodes with bad dot product values.
output-files.name: Bad Nodes Output File

output-files.description: Colorized file containing nodes with bad dot product values.
output-files.name: Bad Nodes Color Output File

output-files.description: File containing dot product values for all nodes.
output-files.name: Dot Product Output File

output-files.description: Colorized file containing dot product values for all nodes.
output-files.name: Dot Product Color Output File

output-files.description: File containing indices of nodes forming segments that intersect the surface.
output-files.name: Intersect Nodes Output File
